messages.message: ApiName and/or action was not provided. List of permitted APIs for this token is returned.

payload.name: SPM
payload.description: Returns execution logs of the monitors for the specified project and timeframe.

params.name: ENVIRONMENT_ID
params.description: The id of the environment.

params.name: EARLIEST_TIME
params.description: The unix time(milliseconds since 01.01.1970 UTC) of the earliest time included in the results.

params.name: LATEST_TIME
params.description: The unix time(milliseconds since 01.01.1970 UTC) of the earliest time included in the results.

params.name: PROJECT_ID
params.description: The id of the project.

params.name: APIFORMAT
params.description: The return format of the api call.

payload.name: SPM

params.name: PROJECT_ID
params.description: The id of the project.

params.name: MONITOR_NAME
params.description: The name of the monitor.

params.name: APIFORMAT
params.description: The return format of the api call.
